properties.entry:
A CQ content package containing the initial content used during the develop phase. By allowing developers to share content this way, it allows for easier testing during early development.
Eventually, once the project progresses to QA and/or Production, this module should be deleted. At that point development environments should be seeded with content created in QA and/or Production by creating content packages in those environments.
During development, the files in this module should be sync'd to your CQ instance using the FileVault command line tool available with CQ. There is also a plugin for Eclipse called "vaultclipse" that can be used instead of the command line tool.
